content.description: Start low under the fin with matched hands and a right heel on the same starting ledge as "Parallax". Move up through the ledges to a blocky crimp left of the fin above the lip.  Using the jugs on the fin and a sneaky right knee bar, climb straight up to the flat shelf under the roof and escape out left.
content.location: Pass the Hero Wall and look for the large rounded fin jutting out above the lip of the shallow roof.  "Two Face" starts on the large ledge below.

content.description: Start on crimps under a large section of the roof left of "Two Face". Make a big right move to the slopey crimp lip.  Make it up to the big shelf ledge for a burly mantle to the top.
content.location: In the far left section of the shallow roof in the Villian's Lair.  The project tops out on the far right side of the large ledge ABOVE the lip of the roof.

content.description: Start with hands matched and a left heel on the largest obvious ledge under the roof.  Make a big move left up to a knob at the lip.  Use sidepulls, seams, and face holds to top out between two boulders above.
content.location: Pass the Hero Wall and look far right in the shallow roof past "Fin Fang Foom".  You'll see two seams at the lip of the roof that connect to create a sort of trapezoid shape.  The line runs through the seams.

content.description: Stand start with you hands in a large undercling slot and feet on a lower block.  Climb straight up using face holds (arête is off).
content.location: On the far left side of the Fin Fang Foom block in the Villian's Lair.

content.description: Stand start far left under the roof matched on a horizontal pinch.  Make a big move to the big shelf ledge and make a burly mantle for the top.
content.location: As far left in the shallow roof of the Villian's Lair as possible.

content.description: Start standing directly underneath the arête with small underclings on an overhanging block feature.  Climb up using the arête and face holds.  Top out over the sharp fin.
content.location: Pass the Hero Wall and you'll see a sharp grey fin jutting out from the cliff band.  "Fin Fang Foom" follows the arete.

content.description: The Villian's Lair or "The Lair" offers challenging lines that often require more technique than burl.  It holds a sharp arete, a long shallow roof, and some massive mantles.  It's an admiral part of the wall that should not be overlooked.  Make sure to save some strength for this part of the wall!
